segments.text: Welcome , sir . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I wanna go to America for my vacation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Actually , we have some great packages . The most exciting season of Hawaii is now . How about a relaxing vacation in Hawaii ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . Are there any group tours I can go with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . There will be one at the end of this month . For many people , a Hawaiian vacation promises languid days filled with sunbathing and poolside cocktails . For others , it ’ s all about non-stop action in one of the world's most extreme natural playgrounds . Whether you are in search of quiet relaxation or unbridled stimulation , Hawaii gives you the best of both .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . So how long is the trip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 15 days . The transportation by air will take five days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . I happen to have 20 days for holiday , so exciting ! How many places will be visited and what are they ? Where will be staying and how about the food there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , let's do it step by step . First , we will visit over 25 different places . Most of the places are in Hawaii ’ s Big Island . We will stay in Arlott ’ s Lodge
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , cool . What's the price for this trip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , right now there's a special rate for 40,000 RIB for this package , including everything such as airline ticket , tour guides , hotels and food . All you have to do is to sign up and we will take care of everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . 40,000 RIB that's really a lot of money . I will have to think about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . By the way , this special price is only good through the end of the week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it Thursday ? I mean if I let the chance slide ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . It will be a great pity !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . Ok , I will take it .
segments.speaker: S2
